title: IDF killed Gaza aid workers at point blank range in 2025 massacre: Report

aiHeadline: IDF 'peacekeepers' show their commitment to humanitarian aid by murdering aid workers at point-blank range in Gaza—because nothing says 'help' like a bullet to the head.

title: Blood test boosts Alzheimer's diagnosis accuracy to 94.5%, clinical study shows
